channel.title: CVE Feed for jgraph -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jgraph -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1711|2024-08-03T00:10:03.912Z -- jgraph -- jgraph%2Fdrawio
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in GitHub repository jgraph/drawio prior to 18.0.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-1722|2024-08-03T00:10:03.906Z -- jgraph -- jgraph%2Fdrawio
item.description: SSRF in editor's proxy via IPv6 link-local address in GitHub repository jgraph/drawio prior to 18.0.5. SSRF to internal link-local IPv6 addresses

item.title: CVE-2022-1575|2024-08-03T00:10:03.557Z -- jgraph -- jgraph%2Fdrawio
item.description: Arbitrary Code Execution through Sanitizer Bypass in GitHub repository jgraph/drawio prior to 18.0.0. - Arbitrary (remote) code execution in the desktop app. - Stored XSS in the web app.

item.title: CVE-2022-1713|2024-08-03T00:10:03.954Z -- jgraph -- jgraph%2Fdrawio
item.description: SSRF on /proxy in GitHub repository jgraph/drawio prior to 18.0.4. An attacker can make a request as the server and read its contents. This can lead to a leak of sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2022-1721|2024-08-03T00:10:03.857Z -- jgraph -- jgraph%2Fdrawio
item.description: Path Traversal in WellKnownServlet in GitHub repository jgraph/drawio prior to 18.0.5. Read local files of the web application.
